text: @NYGovCuomo Latest CDC estimate from March 31 numbers - death rate from Cov19 is 1 in 6725 - should put an end to hysteria surrounding the virus and “lockdowns” Ave. American under 50 has a 0.00015% chance of dying from Cov19 https://t.co/k8oL6RgDLn
